abstract: saudi king receives egypt parl ' t speaker abel aal .
article: riyadh -- 3 january : saudi king salman bin abdulaziz al saud had a meeting on wednesday with speaker of egypt 's house of representatives ali abel aal at al yamama palace in riyadh , the saudi press agency reported . during the meeting , abdel aal conveyed the greetings of egyptian president abdel fattah el sisi to the ... riyadh -- 3 january : saudi king salman bin abdulaziz al saud had a meeting on wednesday with speaker of egypt 's house of representatives ali abel aal at al yamama palace in riyadh , the saudi press agency reported .

during the meeting , abdel aal conveyed the greetings of egyptian president abdel fattah el sisi to the saudi king , who greeted him in return . the two sides discussed boosting bilateral cooperation , particularly in the parliamentary field . the meeting was attended by chairman of the majlis al-shura abdullah ibn muhammad al sheikh , several senior officials and parliamentarians , as well as egyptian ambassador to the kingdom nasser hamdi .
